    • Constructor Detail

      • ChancellorScreen

        public ChancellorScreen(RoboticonQuest game,
                        int attempts,
                        float timeoutPerAttempt,
                        float chancellorDuration)
        NEW: The constructor for the cancellor phase
        Parameters:
        game - The RoboticonQuest object used to interact with the rest of the game
        attempts - The number of times the chancellor image will be displayed before moving onto the next game phase
        timeoutPerAttempt - The maximum amount of time the player has to wait until the chancellor is displayed
        chancellorDuration - The amount of time the chancellor is displayed for before hiding
